scripts.dev:replace:apple: gsed -i 's/.\/index.css/\/explorer\/public\/index.css/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer.html && gsed -i 's/.\/index.css/\/explorer\/public\/index.css/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer-list.html && gsed -i 's/explorer.html/\/explorer/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer-list.html && gsed -i 's/explorer-list.html/\/explorer\/list/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer-list.html  && gsed -i 's/explorer.html/\/explorer/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer.html && gsed -i 's/explorer-list.html/\/explorer\/list/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer.html
scripts.dev:replace:gnu: sed -i 's/.\/index.css/\/explorer\/public\/index.css/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer.html && sed -i 's/.\/index.css/\/explorer\/public\/index.css/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer-list.html && sed -i 's/explorer.html/\/explorer/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer-list.html && sed -i 's/explorer-list.html/\/explorer\/list/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer-list.html  && sed -i 's/explorer.html/\/explorer/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer.html && sed -i 's/explorer-list.html/\/explorer\/list/g' src/main/resources/view/explorer.html
scripts.dev:prepare: npm run dev:clean && npm run dev:prepare:html && npm run dev:prepare:assets
scripts.dev:build:apple: npm i && npm run dev:clean && npm run dev:prepare && npm run dev:replace:apple && npm run dev:replace:logo:apple
scripts.dev:build: npm i && npm run dev:clean && npm run dev:prepare && npm run dev:replace:gnu && npm run dev:replace:logo:gnu
